about_the_game:
Led by lead composer Tetsuya Shibata, the Devil May Cry composers have returned with all-new hard rock and heavy metal arrangements of favorite tracks from the franchise.

The 42+ minute album has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
